title: Tech baseball announces promotions for Pitt home series - VT hokiesports.com
content: Tech baseball announces promotions for Pitt home series  VT hokiesports.com
description: Arriving at its first ACC home series of the season this weekend, the Virginia Tech baseball team is eager to announce promotions and gameday experience elements fans can expect when attending the Hokies' three games against Pitt between Friday, March 18, and Sunday, March 20.
